import React from 'react'; import {Form,InputGroup,Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import './CreateProfileNGO.css'; const CreateProfileNGO = () =>{ const [name,setName] = useState(''); const [email,setEmail] = useState(''); const [prevWork,setPrevWork] = useState(''); const [endGoal,setEndGoal] = useState(''); const [howGoal,setHowGoal] = useState(''); return(
NGO Name setName(e.target.value)} /> Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} /> Which type of NGO are you? Tell us something about your work so far: setPrevWork(e.target.value)} /> What is your end goal? setEndGoal(e.target.value)} /> How do you plan to achieve this goal? setHowGoal(e.target.value)} /> What has been your impact on the environment and society? setImpact(e.target.value)} /> What are your funding needs? setFunding(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default CreateProfileNGO;
